In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mpullout[0m [93mtests[0m were [93mconducted[0m on [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposites[0m [93mreinforced[0m with [93mDNTs[0m, [93mnitrogen[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mdiamond[0m [93mnanothreads[0m ([93mNDNTs[0m), and [93mCNTs[0m, to [93manalyze[0m the [93mpullout[0m [93mperformance[0m and [93mreinforcing[0m [93mmechanisms[0m [93macross[0m [93mvarious[0m [93mtemperature[0m [93mranges[0m. Among the [93mDNT[0m [91mvariants[0m, the [93mDNT2[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposite[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mpullout[0m [93mperformance[0m, which was [93mattributed[0m to its [93mhelical[0m [93mstructure[0m that [93menhanced[0m [93mmechanical[0m [93minterlocking[0m within the [93masphalt[0m [93mmatrix[0m. [93mNotably[0m, [93mNDNTs[0m [93mshowed[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mbinding[0m [93menergy[0m [93mrelative[0m to [93mDNTs[0m and [93mCNTs[0m, [93mstemming[0m from [93minteractions[0m between [93mhydroxyl[0m [93mgroups[0m on [93masphaltene[0m-[93mphenol[0m and [93mnitrogen[0m [93matoms[0m on [93mNDNTs[0m, [93mleading[0m to the [93mformation[0m of [93mO[0m-[93mH[0m⋯[93mN[0m [93mhydrogen[0m [93mbonds[0m. [93mDensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m ([93mDFT[0m) [93mcalculations[0m [93mindicated[0m that [93mnitrogen[0m [93mdoping[0m [93mmodified[0m the [93melectronic[0m [93mstructure[0m of [93mNDNTs[0m, [93mresulting[0m in [93mlocalized[0m [93mnegative[0m [93mcharges[0m that [93menhance[0m [93mtheir[0m [93moverall[0m [93melectronegativity[0m.
